bibl.title: Certificate from Washington and Jefferson College to John J. Moran, October 26, 1940

div1.p: This certificate recognizes Moran as a hero.

div1.head: Certificate from Washington and Jefferson College to John J. Moran, October 26, 1940
div1.p:
Washington and Jefferson College
extends
Official and Public Greetings
to
John J. Moran

Who courageously and unselfishly offered his life in those
notable experiments whereby the cause of yellow fever was
discovered and the means of its eradication indicated.

Whom we therefore recognize as a hero in the finest sense
of the word and a benefactor of humanity.

And whose noble and inestimable assistance to Doctor
Jesse Lazear is now recognized by the college in which
Doctor Lazear began his studies.

In token of our gratitude and in recognition of his great
service this greeting is authorized and this scroll is
inscribed under the great seal of the College by order of
The Board of Trustees, October 26, 1940.
